descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=4]please use the topic under forums tab for reporting bugs(much appreciated and thanks in advance!), suggestions or requests if any till commenting is locked...[/size][/color][color=#ff0000]

[/color][u][size=5]Description[/size][/u]

[size=3]adds peeing to skyrim!
[/size]

[size=4](the following videos contain v1.1 features only!)
[/size]

[youtube]ED2CNCMZB0o[/youtube]



[youtube]D7pLh0WCXuU[/youtube]

[u]
[size=5]Installation instructions[/size][/u]
[size=4]
1) install skse ([url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]http://skse.silverlock.org/[/url])
1) install FNIS ([size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11811/?]htt[/url][/size][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11811/?]p://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11811/?[/url])[/size]
2) install ZAZ animation pack (including the texture pack, google) and its requirements
3) install this mod
4) run GenerateFNISforUsers 
5) if installation is correct, after loading your game you will see 'initializing alive engine...'
6) key map will be asked
7) hold the desired key until 'initialization complete' is displayed

*for those who are having trouble with using the setting commands,

set [color=#ff0000](space)[/color] _AliveActivityPeeBladder and not set_AliveActivityPeeBladder

*for those having problem with keymapping, check if you have a controller plugged in! and if you do, unplug it during the keymap.

[/size]
[u][size=5]Controls[/size][/u]

[size=3]    N : checks bladder

    set  _AliveActivityPeeBladderRate to X : Sets bladder update rate (where X is the Bladder update value per 15 minutes of
    game time.  e.g. 1.5)

[/size]
[size=3]1) bladder between 20 and 30, manual pee mode,[/size]

[size=3]    Hold PeeKey: Posture 1 [/size]
[size=3]    LShift + Hold PeeKey: Posture 2[/size]
[size=3]    Sneak + Hold PeeKey: Posture 3[/size]
[size=3]    Sneak + LShift + Hold PeeKey: Posture 4[/size]
[size=3]    Release PeeKey: interrupt[/size]

[size=3]2) bladder between 30 and 40, automatic pee mode,[/size]

[size=3]    Tap PeeKey to interrupt[/size]

[size=3]3) bladder over 40 or a number of interruptions, burst mode[/size]

[size=3]    No sprinting + running + object activation[/size]

[size=3]
   for a quick test, set the bladder manually in console,[/size]

[size=3]   set _AliveActivityPeeBladder to X[/size]

[size=3]   where X is the bladder value e.g. 35 
[/size]

[u][size=5]Requirements[/size][/u]

[size=3]SKSE [/size]
[size=3]FNIS [/size]
[size=3]ZAZ Animation pack (including the texture pack)
[/size]

[u][size=5]Credits[/size][/u]

[size=3]Zaz for the fluidity effect[/size]
[size=3]Leito for the peeing animations[/size]


[u][size=5]Version history [/size][/u]

[size=2][u]v1.3[/u]

-emergency burst mode if bladder > 30 during combat. this means no running/sprinting/object activation but moving       
 and weapon using is possible.

-sheathes weapon if drawn before peeing (fixes previous 2H weapon glitch)

-fixes a bug of urine stream flowing after a too early interruption

-more interruption tolerance when the bladder is < 30

-no crotch grab while weapons drawn

[u]v1.2[/u]

-key mapping

-bladderrate

-visual cue (see images)

-numerous minor additions (too lazy to write them down ..) and a few bugfixes

[u]v1.1[/u]

the default peeing posture is now different for male* (standing) and female (squatting) + new postures...

* an animation bug may exist for Pee 2 (see below) for males.
[/size]
author: skyrimalive
